channel.title: Comments on: Reading Sloterdijkâ€™s Spheres, alongside Stengers and Barad

item.title: By: Dr. Amanda Windle (@anotherwindle)
item.dc:creator: Dr. Amanda Windle (@anotherwindle)
item.description: A lovely response to the roundtable, which shows the trouble with Sloterdijk and how feminist STS offers something more.
item.content:encoded: A lovely response to the roundtable, which shows the trouble with Sloterdijk and how feminist STS offers something more.
